department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: A brief summary explaining the purpose of the project:
full_summary:
=====================================

**Title and Language**: 
**English:** Request for Information for Land Negotiators Quebec-Ontario for the High Frequency Rail Project
**French:** Demande d’information pour les négociateurs fonciers Québec-Ontario pour le projet de train à grande fréquence

**Identifiers and Reference**: 
* Reference number: WS4403461231-Doc4403487014
* Amendment number: 3
* Solicitation number: WS4403461231

**Publication Details**: 
* Publication date: January 19, 2024
* Tender closing date: February 19, 2024 at 14:00 (EST)

**Contractual Details**: 
* Expected contract start date: April 1, 2024

**Notice Information**: 
* Notice type: Request for Information
* Procurement method: Competitive and Selective Tendering
* Regions of opportunity: National Capital Region, Ontario (except the National Capital Region), and Quebec (except the National Capital Region)

**Contractor Information**: 
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting entity address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5
* End user entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End user entity address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5

**Contact Information**: 
* Contact person: Erin Schulz (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact email: [erin.schulz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.schulz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact phone: N/A
* Contact fax: N/A

**Attachments and URLs**: 
* Attachment URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18568252?extsite=MTg1NjgyNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Notice Description**: 
The Canadian Government invites interested parties to submit a response to the Request for Information (RFI) for the provision of Land Negotiators and assistance in real estate services in support of the High Frequency Rail (HFR) team during the acquisition phase of the required properties/land assembly for the construction of a High Frequency
